name: SMS Marketing & mass text messaging
tag_list: sms-marketing, mass-text-messaging, text-message-marketing, sms-appointment-reminder, texting-marketing, text-messaging-services, text-messaging, textsms-gateway, mobile-marketing, group-texting, text-voting, mobile-site, mobile-site-builder, mobile-messa
description: SMS marketing and text messaging service
overview:
TxtImpact is a New York based SMS marketing and mass text messaging service provider. It has been providing text messaging services, sms marketing, mobile marketing platform, mobile messaging, & mobile landing page, QR code and mobile web solutions since 2006.

TxtImpact is focused on providing turnkey text mssaging and sms marketing solution to small, medium and large businesses, retail stores, multi location franchises, restaurants, financial services. Dedicated short code hosting, SMS gateway, Managed mobile marketing platform and Mobile web tools for creating Text alerts, Text Voting, Text2Win, Group Texting, Text Trivia, Text for info, Mobile 2D/QRcode, Mobile websites, office SMS communication tools and complete with enhanced reporting and analytics to measurable campaigns effectiveness. The company helps businesses, and oragization easily manage their Text messaging and Mobile web based marketing campaigns. Txtimpact offers a hybrid self managed mobile marketing platform to execute a measurable mobile marketing campaigns.
